body.name: BULLDOG Mens Skincare and Grooming Face Moisturizer Original, 3.3 Fluid Ounce
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 17 mins
features: INGREDIENTS: Bulldog Original Moisturizer is specially formulated to hydrate skin. Our Original line contains brilliant natural ingredients. Our Moisturizer contains aloe vera, camelina oil and green tea. We combine these with carefully selected man-made ingredients to offer exceptional performance.

REGULAR SKIN: The products in our Original line work simply and effectively to deal with the specific skin issues men face. Bulldog Original products use ingredients that are designed to provide a combination of moisturizing and soothing properties.
BULLDOG IS BY YOUR SIDE: Between the daily rigors of shaving to the general daily strain we put on our skin, Bulldog’s products are designed for everyday use on regular skin.
DIRECTIONS: Use morning and night. Apply evenly to face and neck after cleansing.
WORK TOGETHER: Our Bulldog Original Moisturizer works great with our Original Face Scrub and Wash.
body.description: Bulldog is man's best friend. Designed from the ground up with male skin as their focus, all Bulldog products combine the best of nature and science to work simply and effectively while dealing with the specific issues faced by men's skin. Whether it's regular or sensitive skin, Bulldog has the answer. All Bulldog products contain brilliant natural ingredients and we combine these with carefully selected man-made ingredients to offer exceptional performance at an affordable price. From shave gel to face wash, beard oil to our award winning Original Moisturizer and everything in between, Bulldog has something for every man. Bulldog products never contain artificial colors, synthetic fragrances or ingredients from animal sources. All of our products are suitable for Vegans to Vegetarians and have been certified by Cruelty Free International. Turns out, Bulldog really is Man's Best Friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Awesome moisturizer for men. Great quality. Feels nice. Hydrates but doesn’t leave you feeling greasy. And probably my favourite part is that it has next to no scent. I don’t want something that is perfumy and the few times I put on cologne I don’t want a competing smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great and works amazing
reviews.reviewText: What really sold me on it is when I was giving blood and the nurse said you smell really good and it had been a few hours since I had to put it on….

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Feels great on the skin. Not heavy….

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works effectively as a facial moisturizer. No scent which is important to me and no greasy feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Idk how to convince you I’m a real reviewer, but this stuff was a god-send for me
reviews.reviewText: I grew up in the Midwest where the air was cold & dry. I always had acne and super dry skin. I tried a lot of moisturizers but they all either 1. Did nothing, 2. Made my skin worse.This stuff is so much cheaper than most other products but it’s incredibly effective. I get a bottle of this and the Bulldog face wash every month. Idk why there negative reviews talking about smell. It doesn’t smell like anything. Once, my partner said I smelled a little like apricot but it was 10 min after I had put this on.My only complaint with this is that the bottle top isn’t always airtight, so sometimes, I go to apply the cream and at first, it’s a weird dried-out texture, but then I just wash that off and get another dab and the 2nd dab is perfect since it didn’t get dried out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't feel greasy after applying.
reviews.reviewText: Tried many moisturizers. This one is the best one I found that doesn't leave a greasy feeling after applying.It blends into your skin after rubbing it in. It makes your skin feel soft and feels like you never applied anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I originally purchased this moisturizer for my husband about three years ago. He used it here and there, but regardless of the product, I could never get him into the habit of applying moisturizer of any kind. Then on a trip to visit family in the inland northwest during the month of February, I forgot my own moisturizer and opted to use my husband's, figuring it was better than nothing, especially in the brisk Washington weather. Honestly, I was very surprised to find how light, yet how hydrating and moisturizing this moisturizer is. I was delighted to find that it did not irritate my extremely sensitive skin and did not leave a greasy sheen, unlike my normal products. After adding this to my daily skin care regimen, I have found that my under eye area appears less crepe-y and the tone seems brighter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as should

reviews.reviewText: This was for my son. He seems to like it

Me encanta, no es grasosa y se absorbe rápido. Huele un poco diferente a lo habitual, ya que está hecha con ingredientes naturales (supongo), pero de cualquier forma no es un aroma fuerte ni desagradable y el precio es excelente aún siendo un producto hecho en el Reino Unido.

Mi esposo ya había probado cremas de la roche-posay, eucerin y avéne pero con ninguna había estado conforme hasta que le compre esta. Le gustó mucho, tanto que me ha pedido la vuelva a comprar cuando se la termine.Ya es la tercera compra y sigue encantado!
Se siente bien la textura de la cara y te la deja Lisa, además no es grasosa, tiene buen olor en general me gusto mucho, vale la pena el precio. Pero como saber si no esta caducada?
Me encanto, una crema para la piel de un hombre, que no te abrillanta ni te hace oler a mujer, ideal para tener un toque masculino que se nota
